cheat.description: Start with 1 life
Start with 5 lives
Start with 7 lives
Start with 9 lives
Start with mega lives
Can't collect Coconuts
Start with 5 Coconuts plus what you've collected in sub-game
Start with 10 Coconuts plus what you've collected in sub-game
Start with 15 Coconuts plus what you've collected in sub-game
Infinite lives
Start with less health
Start with a little more health
Start with 2x health
Start with a lot more health
Start on level XX (can't advance to next level) (1 of 2)
Start on level 1-3 (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Start on level 1-4 (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Watch the level 2 Cinema (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Start on level 2-2 (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Start on level 2-3 (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Start on level 2-4 (can't advance to next level) (2 of 2)
Have all 8 health slots
